sources.title: Professional Speaker | George B. Thomas
sources.summary: George B. Thomas's official speaker website featuring his professional speaking services, topics, and booking information. For over 12 years, he has been at the forefront of HubSpot expertise, sales and marketing strategies, and business growth. He is the creator of the HubHeroes Podcast, owner of Sidekick Strategies, and visionary behind the Superhuman Framework.
keyPoints: Professional speaker with 25+ years of sales and marketing experience
Creator of HubHeroes Podcast and Superhuman Framework
Owner of Sidekick Strategies
Record-breaking 40+ HubSpot certifications
Speaking topics include Marketing, Sales, Video, Podcasting, and the Superhuman Framework
Presentations described as transformative experiences packed with bold ideas, real talk, and actionable strategies
quotes: I speak for a purpose. I speak so others can find that spark within themselves to realize their best self.

Sometimes, it just takes a shot in the arm. Other times, it's a reminder of your deep-seated values and beliefs. Whatever the case, when I hit the stage, your audience will be inspired, and most likely, quite energized.

quotes: In this no-BS, high-energy session, I'm unveiling the SuperHuman Marketing Framework—a blueprint for marketing that feels good, builds trust, and converts like crazy.

sources.title: Emcee Services with George B. Thomas
sources.summary: Dedicated page for George's emcee services, highlighting his experience hosting events and introducing speakers at major conferences.
keyPoints: Professional emcee services available for hire
Has had rooms of 700+ people laughing, engaged, and energized
Great stage presence with skill and humor
Sets up speeches effectively for other speakers
Worked as Emcee at Social Media Marketing World at San Diego Convention Centre
quotes: He exuded great stage presence, and he lifted the energy of the room with skill and humor! If you get the chance to work with George as a Keynote Speaker or Emcee, grab it with both hands!

George is a generous and gracious emcee - a perfect mix of relaxed and exacting. He's there to make sure the audience has the best possible experience, but he's also there to be sure things move along as they should. George simply sets the perfect tone.

quotes: Until you embrace being vulnerable, you're going to miss out on the magic in life.
My life's purpose is to be a catalyst for others to be their best.

quotes: The moment he landed in Boston and entered his first HubSpot INBOUND event, something fundamentally changed in his brain - the humanity-focused message of HubSpot spoke to his soul and his purpose.

sources.title: George B. Thomas - Sidekick Strategies | LinkedIn

keyPoints: 12 LinkedIn recommendations
Founder at Sidekick Strategies
Professional speaker and emcee credentials
HubSpot certified trainer
25+ years sales and marketing experience
quotes: I definitely recommend George as a top notch marketer, video creator, HubSpot expert and all around good person to know.

George's passion for helping others shines through in all his work. Whether he's on stage at Social Media World in front of thousands or on a HubSpot onboarding call with one person, his energy, care and desire to teach shine through.
I was fortunate to work with George in his role as Emcee at Social Media Marketing World, with him introducing me for my presentation.

quotes: A catalyst for these conversations of what it means (and what it takes) to live a life Beyond Your Default - to live beyond what we're told to accept, beyond day-to-day monotony, and to reach for something bigger and greater.

sources.title: The Superhuman Framework for Individual + Organizational Success
sources.summary: Detailed explanation of the Superhuman Framework, George's signature methodology built around four cornerstones and ten H-pillars for personal and professional growth.
keyPoints: Four Cornerstones: Love, Purpose, Passion, and Persistence
Ten H-pillars for comprehensive life assessment
Framework designed as dashboard for life
Tools to identify areas of thriving and areas needing focus
Applies to both individual and organizational success
Core speaking topic at major conferences
quotes: At the heart of the Superhuman Framework are the Four Cornerstones: Love, Purpose, Passion, and Persistence. These aren't just feel-good buzzwords—they're the bedrock of a life that's not just good but extraordinary.

sources.title: Carving Your Own Path with George B. Thomas - Dial It In Podcast
sources.summary: Podcast interview discussing George's journey from Impulse Creative to launching Sidekick Strategies, entrepreneurship challenges, and authenticity.

speakingTopics.description: How to cut through the noise, craft messaging that truly resonates, and align strategy with purpose, measurable results, and the humans you're here to serve.
Stop selling like it's 2010. Building trust, forging authentic connections that truly matter, and closing deals faster—all while keeping the process human, genuine, and impactful.

If you're not using video to grow your brand, you're already falling behind. Harnessing the power of video to tell compelling stories, build genuine trust with your audience, and drive meaningful conversions.
Insider secrets from hosting the HubHeroes Podcast about building authority and creating meaningful connections with audiences.
Guiding audiences through aligning mind, body, and spirit with Purpose, Passion, Persistence, and Love—empowering them to flourish personally, professionally, and in every aspect of their lives.
Expert-level training on HubSpot tools including CRM, marketing, sales, service, operations, and CMS. Over 40 certifications and 12+ years of expertise.

testimonials.quote: He exuded great stage presence, and he lifted the energy of the room with skill and humor! If you get the chance to work with George as a Keynote Speaker or Emcee, grab it with both hands!
testimonials.context: After emceeing at Social Media Marketing World

testimonials.quote: George's passion for helping others shines through in all his work. Whether he's on stage at Social Media World in front of thousands or on a HubSpot onboarding call with one person, his energy, care and desire to teach shine through.
George is one of those rare individuals that connects with people at an amazingly intimate level. He gives the audience 100% of himself, whether it's an audience of 50 or 5,000.

George is a generous and gracious emcee - a perfect mix of relaxed and exacting. He's there to make sure the audience has the best possible experience, but he's also there to be sure things move along as they should. George simply sets the perfect tone.
A fantastic, fun, engaging speaker - his sessions at INBOUND are can't-miss.
George knows HubSpot better than anyone.

George is one of those rare human beings that knows how to communicate the value of complicated marketing strategies in a clear, concise, and compelling way. And he does it with an infectious smile and more energy than a Red Bull athlete.

The team at Vidyard has had George B. Thomas keynote our virtual event three years in a row. He is not only an incredible educator and trainer on a diverse range of topics, but also one of the most energetic, passionate, helpful, and human speakers in a virtual setting.

notableEvents.notes: Spoken every year since 2015. INBOUND 2025 features encore session on Superhuman Marketing Framework.
Served as emcee at San Diego Convention Centre, introduced presenters, engaged crowds of thousands.
Keynoted virtual event three years in a row. Presented 'Video Production 101 for ANY B2B Marketer'.
Hosts video show on MarketingProfs platform interviewing B2B marketing experts.
